column4: My icons and shortcuts on the desktop just disappeared ... Also the background picture disappeared..... please help
My icons and shortcuts on the desktop just disappeared ... Also the background picture disappeared..... please help. !!! I am using Gnome desktop
look at the other workspaces, you may have clicked on the empty one
all workspace act the same ... just a boring blue backgound
I've check the ~/Desktop/, all the files are still there
if you type alt+tab any thing shows up?
the last time before this happened, I put a unreadable VCD into the tray, and the box get unresponse, I loged out with CTRL ALT backspace
that should just restarted your X window..reboot and everything should be back in order
pressing Alt+Tab .... things as is ... the working list appeared
It's still nothing on the desktop, just the GNOME bar & the application bar
maybe you re-create the icons again?
I cant even change the background by right click the desktop, I have to do it through the menu
the desktop comes not response to right click
its seems like there is an app that if covering your entire display..i had something like that before..
I found that: when login with another user, the splash screen ... show 'loading desktop' icon; while, with the current user, there is no 'loading desktop' while loging in ???
they both have same config files? check those
nope, each user has a diff config, I think ... but I dun know which is the config file
